metadata.description: A curated collection of plugins for Claude Code to enhance productivity and workflow automation

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Automatically creates semantic git commits by analyzing staged and unstaged changes, reviewing recent commit history, and following conventional commit message format (feat, fix, docs, refactor, etc.)

plugins.name: frontend-dev
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Generates creative, polished code using shadcn/ui components, avoiding generic AI aesthetics. Focuses on component isolation and testability.

plugins.name: claude-md-optimizer
plugins.description: Comprehensive CLAUDE.md analyzer and optimizer. Applies industry best practices from Anthropic, HumanLayer, and community experts to maximize Claude Code effectiveness. Features: codebase analysis, anti-pattern detection, effectiveness scoring, prioritized recommendations, and optional CLAUDE.md generation.
